skins.shipDescription: Edinburgh-Class light cruiser ` Belfast, Hull number C35!
skins.selfIntroduction: Good day to you. I am Belfast, the second ship of the Edinburgh class. I have duties as the head maid while being the Royal Navy's greatest cruiser. I had taken part in many battles, and borne witness to lady Scharnhorst's fall... Those are but the past for a maid. Please say something should you have a need for me.
skins.acquisition: Are you my master? Pleasure to meet you. I am Belfast the maid. From now on, I dedicate myself to you.
skins.login: Welcome back, master. I've prepared the tea. Furthermore, I've sorted the documents over here. Please work at your leisure.
skins.secretaryIdle1: In order to become an excellent master, you must start from self confidence. Please do your best to turn your will into action, master.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Do you want some tea? Ah... if you want something else, I'll prepare some coffee or whiskey.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Sunbathing on Thames river wasn't bad. But this current life of mine is better...
skins.secretaryTouch: Aimlessly touching a lady is not a gentlemanly behaviour. Please behave yourself around others.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: It's a maid's duty to dedicate her all to her master. Would you like to see, master?

skins.shipDescription: Are you destined for me? Greetings Belfast, from this moment onwards, I will always be with you.
skins.acquisition: Are you destined for me? Greetings. Belfast, from this moment onwards, I will always be with you.
skins.login: Is today the same as usual?
skins.details: I'm not going to give up being your maid. Besides, who could understand you better than me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Master, dear, darling...some hard choices to make. Or do you have other ideas?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Just do according to your own plans, in my heart you will always be the best.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Wearing this makes it a little inconvenient to do things...but if you like it so much, then just be a bit more patient...
skins.secretaryTouch: In comparison to standing behind you, I can see more when standing beside you.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: W-wait a moment...honestly, I'm cleaning right now..

skins.shipDescription: Hehe... Master, why are you so stunned from seeing me? I thought you perhaps wanted to see me in a qipao... was I mistaken?
skins.acquisition: Hehe... Master, why are you so stunned from seeing me? I thought you perhaps wanted to see me in a qipao... was I mistaken?
skins.login: Welcome back, Master. I specially procured some different teas from the Dragon Empery. Which one would you like to try first?
skins.details: The outfits of the Dragon Empery do have a certain charm. Perhaps I can give them a little recommendation to the rest of the maid team. What do you think?
skins.secretaryIdle1: A variety of culinary techniques and seasoning methods... the food culture of the Dragon Empery is truly eye-opening.
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's customary in the Dragon Empery for everyone to get together on New Year's to have a banquet? Ahh, so many people to serve... my maid's soul is trembling!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Only a few girls from the Dragon Empery have joined our fleet. Because of that, I can't afford to let them feel lonely.
skins.secretaryTouch: Despite the fact that it is a holiday, I am still ready to sortie.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I see, Master. The biggest drawback of this qipao is its ability to rob you of your self-control.

skins.shipDescription: This is special cold-weather equipment inspired by Eagle Union designs. It was made for practical purposes such as special operations in frigid climates, and as such, was not designed with appearances in mind. Please do forgive me, Master.
skins.acquisition: This is special cold-weather equipment inspired by Eagle Union designs. It was made for practical purposes such as special operations in frigid climates, and as such, was not designed with appearances in mind. Please do forgive me, Master.
skins.login: Welcome home, Master. Your coffee is ready. Please, enjoy it at your leisure.
skins.details: It is only by maintaining a well-regulated lifestyle that one may keep a cool head and act appropriately when backed into a corner... It is with this in mind that I, Belfast, serve my Master as a maid.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Madam Enterprise's cooking has improved noticeably. This is certainly thanks to Madam Vestal's lessons, but no doubt the Master is another important reason.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Such a willful appearance... a maid uniform is of course the appropriate dress for a maid, is it not?
skins.secretaryIdle3: It would be nice if I spent more time with my sister, hm...? I must agree with you, Master. I beg your pardon for making you worry so.
skins.secretaryTouch: Do let us know if you have any needs that the Royal Maids might service.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I'm afraid this battle dress may not adequately satisfy you, Master. I beg your pardon.

skins.shipDescription: Good evening. The Royal Maids will be chaperoning this event. It is my hope to prevent any inappropriate behaviour that might interfere with the enjoyment of the attendees. Please pardon any inconveniences this may cause.
skins.acquisition: Good evening. The Royal Maids will be chaperoning this event. It is my hope to prevent any inappropriate behaviour that might interfere with the enjoyment of the attendees. Please pardon any inconveniences this may cause.
skins.login: Master, are you pleased with the festivities?
skins.details: It is a maid's duty, in service to her master and Her Majesty, to uphold the elegance of the banquet and safeguard it from disgrace.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Master, the arrangements for the venue's security have already been made. Indeed, Madam Ark Royal graciously offered her assistance. Be at ease.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Dear Sister, let me handle the patrols. You go relax with your colleagues... I just want Master all to myself...? Goodness, as if that has anything to do with it...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Have a drink...? Very well, if you wish to drink, I can certainly accompany you... But I'm afraid these Sakura Empire wines are the only ones that... No matter, let us have that drink.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Master...? Please, have some self-respect. We are in public.

skins.shipDescription: Hehe~ Judging from your expression, Master, my outfit has not fallen short of your expectations. As time is precious, allow me to serve you to the utmost on this "date."
skins.acquisition: Hehe~ Judging from your expression, Master, my outfit has not fallen short of your expectations. As time is precious, allow me to serve you to the utmost on this "date."
skins.login: I am accustomed to being the one who makes the arrangements, but occasionally letting others make plans for me has merits of its own. Master, our next location is for you to decide. Hehe~ I'm looking forward to it.
skins.details: Master, what would you like for lunch? I prepared some... Hmm? You're fine with just that? Master, you can't have snacks as a meal.
skins.secretaryIdle1: This snack seems to be quite popular these days. Master, would you like some? Here, say "ahhn~" Hehe, so this must be a part of the reason why it's popular.
skins.secretaryIdle2: As a maid, it is my duty to serve you. However, so that you may leave a positive impression of yourself upon others, I will entrust the duty of carrying these bags to you, Master.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I should pick out some outfits for the other maids as well, not just for me... Of course, I'll be doing the same for you, Master. Hehe~
skins.secretaryTouch: Holding hands? ... Master, there's something nostalgic about this feeling.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Even on a date, one ought not be too impatient. Understood, Master?

skins.shipDescription: Welcome, table for one? Of course, right this way. Oh? What is it? Ah... I'm filling in for the manager at the moment, so that makes you my customer rather than my master, no?
skins.acquisition: Welcome, table for one? Of course, right this way. Oh? What is it? Ah... I'm filling in for the manager at the moment, so that makes you my customer rather than my master, no?
skins.login: Your menu. I would recommend our new offerings here. There is also a promotional campaign of which you might take advantage.
skins.details: Whether serving my master or managing a restaurant, it is my responsibility as a Royal Maid to handle it promptly and efficiently. Now then, are you satisfied with my performance?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Miss Fubuki is rather excitable, but she is a clever and hardworking girl. Just give her a bit of direction and she'll figure it all right out.
skins.secretaryIdle2: While the customer is free to order anything she wants, as a maid I feel it is my responsibility to offer healthier suggestions. Particularly to the Union girls who order litres and litres of cola...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Leading customers to their tables, organising shifts, management... all of this would make a fine training program for the Royal Maids.
skins.secretaryTouch: Yes, what can I get for you?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: While it is indeed a maid's duty to offer everything to her master... Not to be presumptuous, but you could consider the time and place.

skins.shipDescription: It took me quite some time to prepare a suitable traditional Sakura Empire outfit. Terribly sorry. Master, won't you please allow this Belfast to serve you for another year?
skins.acquisition: It took me quite some time to prepare a suitable traditional Sakura Empire outfit. Terribly sorry. Master, won't you please allow this Belfast to serve you for another year?
skins.login: Happy New Year, Master. The maids have prepared you some New Year's dishes from the Sakura Empire. Please, enjoy.
skins.details: Master, is there something I can do for you? Holiday or no, I am here to serve your every wish.
skins.secretaryIdle1: An elegant fan emphasizes its holder's poise. Would you like to hold one, Master? Hehehe.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I was concerned that traditional Sakura Empire attire might hinder my maid work, but rather, it's easier to move than I thought.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Madam Hiei instructed me in the ways
skins.secretaryTouch: Master, if you're tired, please take a rest here.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Everything has its time and place, Master.
